Interventions improve physical activity level child show great success target low-active adolescent girl employ strategy enhance adolescent ' enjoyment physical activity . Go Girls ! new dance-based patient fitness support group offer via Pediatric Endocrinology division conjunction Center Research Reproduction Children 's Fitness Clinic girls at-risk weight-related medical complication , particularly excess weight , polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) , diabetes mellitus , insulin resistance . The goal program introduce girl exercise fun , non-threatening environment , meet girl similar health concern , enable girl discover develop personal enjoyment exercise , enable low-pressure interaction medical care provider . The primary aim study determine change girls ' enjoyment exercise . Our hypothesis introduce girl fun , non-threatening environment exercise peer support modify score physical activity enjoyment scale . Secondary aim ass change weekly exercise , attitude exercise , metabolic parameter evidence androgen ( male hormone ) excess ( precursor PCOS ) . Subjects recruit girl already participate Go Girls ! program .
